member.summary: The PerceivedType from the Registry of this media type

member.summary: Determines if files of this type should be added to the media library

member.summary: The search filters that should be applied when searching for this type of media

member.name: P:SnapStream.ViewScape.Services.MediaTypeInfo.MediaFolderDensity
member.summary: The ratio of files of this media type to all other files in a directory that must be satisfied before a directory that contains media of this type will be considered a directory that contains this media type so a density of 0.5 for "audio" files means that in any given folder at least half of the files must be audio before it is considered an audio directory.

member.name: P:SnapStream.ViewScape.Services.MediaTypeInfo.MinFileSize
member.summary: The minimum file size of a file of this type.

member.name: P:SnapStream.ViewScape.Services.MediaTypeInfo.NameHints
member.summary: A comma separated list of strings that give the searcher hints as to whether or not a directory should be considered a media directory of this type. This is only used when the directory is empty and enables the searcher to find a directory that has not yet been used by the user to store any files.

member.name: P:SnapStream.ViewScape.Services.MediaTypeInfo.NameHintsArray
member.summary: Same thing as NameHints only allows access to the array of name hints

member.name: P:SnapStream.ViewScape.Services.MediaTypeInfo.ItemCount
member.summary: The number of items of this type that must be present in a directory before it is considered a media directory containing file of this media type.

member.name: E:SnapStream.ViewScape.Services.MediaTypeInfo.DirectoryFound
member.summary: Raised when a media directory of this type is found.

member.name: E:SnapStream.ViewScape.Services.MediaTypeInfo.FileFound
member.summary: Raised when a media file of this type is found.

member.name: M:SnapStream.ViewScape.Services.SkinDefaults.SetDefaultsFor(System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the defaults on the specified object
member.param: The type of the object The type specified here should always represent the most derived type of the object that is being skinned. Specifically, typeof should not be used to statically bind your skinable class to its default because classes that inherit from your class will appear to function incorrectly, inheriting the defaults for your class and not for the derived class. Always use Object.GetType to access the map.

member.summary: Sets the defaults on the specified object usign the given prototype

Specifically, typeof should not be used to statically bind your skinable class to its default because classes that inherit from your class will appear to function incorrectly, inheriting the defaults for your class and not for the derived class. Always use Object.GetType to access the map.
The prototype name to map to

member.name: M:SnapStream.ViewScape.Util.DXUtil.Timer(SnapStream.ViewScape.Util.DirectXTimer)
member.summary:
Performs timer opertations. Use the following commands:
DirectXTimer.Reset - to reset the timer DirectXTimer.Start - to start the timer DirectXTimer.Stop - to stop (or pause) the timer DirectXTimer.Advance - to advance the timer by 0.1 seconds DirectXTimer.GetAbsoluteTime - to get the absolute system time DirectXTimer.GetApplicationTime - to get the current time DirectXTimer.GetElapsedTime - to get the time that elapsed between TIMER_GETELAPSEDTIME calls

member.name: M:SnapStream.ViewScape.Util.Launcher.PopulateFullPath
member.summary: This function will populate the fullpath variable Steps: 1. If the full path is already populated, return that value 2. If the _exeFullPath RegistryValue is not null, use that value to populate the full path 3. If the _exePath and _exeName RegistryValues are not null, use them to populate the full path 4. ELSE do nothing

member.name: T:SnapStream.ViewScape.Widgets.Animator
member.summary: Class used for animation. 1. Used to animate from a start rectangle to an end rectangle over a period of time. 2. Used to animate from a minimum value to a maximum value over a period of time. 3. Used to oscillate from a minimum value to a maximum value and back repeatedly.

member.summary: Maximum value for osciallation

member.summary: The graph could not be built because the media was invalid or malformatted or not supported

member.summary: The graph could not be built because it's already open

member.summary: The graph could not be built for an unknown reason

member.summary: Draws the content of this formatter using the specified font properties.

member.name: P:SnapStream.ViewScape.Widgets.TextPane.Font.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the font to draw in.
member.value: If the value of this property is -1 it will be ignored.

member.name: P:SnapStream.ViewScape.Widgets.TextPane.Font.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the font to draw in.
member.value: If the value of this property is Empty it will be ignored.

member.name: P:SnapStream.ViewScape.Widgets.TextPane.Font.Alpha
member.summary: Gets or sets the alpha blending value of the font to draw in.
member.remarks: The value specified here will be multiplied by whatever alpha blending value is currently in effect when this formatter draws itself to arrive at the final alpha value. To specify the alpha value regardless of what the current value is use the AbsAlpha property instead which is not multiplied.
member.value: If the value of this property is -1 it will be ignored.

member.name: P:SnapStream.ViewScape.Widgets.TextPane.Font.AbsAlpha
member.summary: Gets or sets the baseline alpha blending value of the font to draw in.
member.remarks: The value specified here will not be multiplied by the current alpha blending value in the DrawingContext when the formatter draws its contents. This value specifies the actual alpha value that should be used and is not modulated by the current alpha blending value.
member.value: If the value of this property is -1 it will be ignored.
